actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to accord nonimmigrant alien status to certain alien crewman aboard fishing vessels of United States registry.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to classify as nonimmigrant alien crewman certain aliens working on a U.S.-registered fishing boat.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to accord nonimmigrant alien status to certain alien crewman aboard fishing vessels of United States registry.
